cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each nginx instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each nginx task.

role.description: Deploy nginx only on nodes with this role.

contentDir.description: Path of directory, relative to sandbox, containing HTML code. Can NOT be combined with configUrl.

contentUrl.description: URL of content that needs to be hosted. Can NOT be combined with configUrl.

configUrl.description: URL to Nginx configuration that needs to be hosted (e.g., load balancing, reverse proxy, etc). Can NOT be combined with contentUrl or contentDir.

bridge.description: Whether to use BRIDGE networking mode for Docker container. By default, this is false and HOST mode networking is used.
